aidAdha.heading: Celebrate Eid Al-Adha with Generosity

paragraph1.bold: Help provide Qurbani to families facing hardship.
paragraph1.normal: Your gift brings them the joy, dignity, and blessings of Eid â€” a moment they will cherish.

aidAdha.paragraph2: This Eid, let your compassion shine. Share hope, unity, and a nourishing meal with those who need it most.
